name: notes-backend
description: This is the backend for our application

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../part2/notes && npm run build && cp -r build ../../part3/notes-backend
scripts.deploy: cp -r . ../notes-render && cd ../notes-render && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Alex Grau
